00042                 kLinearText_Shift       ,

00045         kFakeBoldText_Shift,    
00046 
00047                 kFlagShiftCount

00049         enum FlagMask {
00050                 kAntiAlias_Mask         = 1 << kAntiAlias_Shift,                
00051                 kLinearText_Mask        = 1 << kLinearText_Shift,               
00052                 kUnderlineText_Mask     = 1 << kUnderlineText_Shift,    
00053                 kStrikeThruText_Mask= 1 << kStrikeThruText_Shift,       
00054                 kFakeBoldText_Mask  = 1 << kFakeBoldText_Shift,     
00055 
00056                 kAllFlagMasks = (1 << kFlagShiftCount) - 1
00057         };

00400 class SkAutoRestorePaintFlags {
00401 public:
00402         SkAutoRestorePaintFlags(const SkPaint& paint, U32 newFlags)
00403         {
00404                 SkASSERT(&paint);
00405                 fPaint = (SkPaint*)&paint;      // remove constness
00406                 fOldFlags = paint.getFlags();
00407                 fPaint->setFlags(newFlags);
00408         }
00409         ~SkAutoRestorePaintFlags()
00410         {
00411                 fPaint->setFlags(fOldFlags);
00412         }
00413 private:
00414         SkPaint* fPaint;
00415         U32              fOldFlags;
00416 };

00418 class SkTypeface : public SkRefCnt {
00419 public:
00420     enum Style {
00421         kNormal = 0,
00422         kBold   = 0x01,
00423         kItalic = 0x02,
00424 
00425         // helpers
00426         kBoldItalic = 0x03
00427     };
00428     
00429     Style   getStyle() const { return (Style)fStyle; }
00430     bool    isBold() const { return (fStyle & kBold) != 0; }
00431     bool    isItalic() const { return (fStyle & kItalic) != 0; }
00432     
00438     static SkTypeface* Create(const char familyName[], Style s = kNormal);
00444     static SkTypeface* CreateFromTypeface(const SkTypeface* family, Style s);
00445 
00446 protected:
00447     void setStyle(Style s) {
00448         fStyle = SkToU8(s);
00449     }
00450     
00451     SkTypeface() {}
00452 
00453 private:
00454     uint8_t fStyle;
00455 };
